overview: Drift off into a sex charged dreamland where Fantasy Boys Evan Parker, Anderson Lovell, Casey Tanner and Jessie Montgomery act out your deepest desires. Fall asleep with naked pool boys tanning their smooth skin, join a slippery hot tub threesome, float by chiseled bodies grinding under heavenly white sheets and gawk over handsome new jock Gabriel West as he makes his Helix debut shooting a creamy load on Aiden Summer's satisfied face.
title: Twink Wet Dream
